Articles.Content:
Space,The final frontier.....Until now we have been dreaming of walking on other worlds......until now.

Here at the Kaether space Center we whant to colonize other worlds on the solar sistem

Not only the mun and minmus....But duna,jool and all the other planets in this solar sistem.And in the near future other solar sistems....

 

This thread is still a WIP,And still only has 1 misión but more will come in the future

Mission 1"First steps".DIficulty:easy

Spoiler

Welcome comander to the Space way project of the Kaether space Center.
In this project we whant to expand our frontiers to space.Not only to low kerbin orbit,But to Duna and the rest of the Kerbol Sistem.And maybe Beyond.
But lets not get our hopes up right away.We still need to make a space station in low kerbin orbit.Thats where you come in.
Your mission is to construct and launch the core of the K.S.S(Kerbin Space Station).
The core needs to have:
Every existing docking port
Solar power
At least 1000 of power storage
A lab
a hab module
And rcs thrusters
And thats all!.

Good luck And remember that the future of Kerbal civilization is in your hands!....Or was it kands?

Steam workshop link:https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1472005225

KerbalX link:https://kerbalx.com/missions/75

 

If you have any suggestions tell them in the comment section!
